redacted: $content = Get-Content -Raw "OBF_PATH"; $invalidChars = $content -split '' | Where-Object { [int][char]$_ -gt 127 }; if ($invalidChars.Count -gt 0) { Write-Output "Found $($invalidChars.Count) non-ASCII characters:"; $invalidChars | Group-Object | Select-Object Name, Count | Format-Table -AutoSize } else { Write-Output "No non-ASCII characters found in README.md" }
normalized: $content = get-content -raw "obf_path"; $invalidchars = $content -split '' | where-object { [int][char]$_ -gt 127 }; if ($invalidchars.count -gt 0) { write-output "found $($invalidchars.count) non-ascii characters:"; $invalidchars | group-object | select-object name, count | format-table -autosize } else { write-output "no non-ascii characters found in readme.md" }

redacted: $filePath = "OBF_PATH"; $content = Get-Content -Raw $filePath; $nonAsciiChars = @(); for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.Length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $char = $content[$i]; $code = [int]$char; $context = $content.Substring([Math]::Max(0, $i-10), [Math]::Min(20, $content.Length - [Math]::Max(0, $i-10))); $nonAsciiChars += @{Char=$char; Code=$code; Position=$i; Context=$context} } }; Write-Output "Found $($nonAsciiChars.Count) non-ASCII characters:"; $nonAsciiChars | ForEach-Object { Write-Output "  Char: '$($_.Char)' Code: $($_.Code) Pos: $($_.Position) Context: '$($_.Context)'" }
normalized: $filepath = "obf_path"; $content = get-content -raw $filepath; $nonasciichars = @(); for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $char = $content[$i]; $code = [int]$char; $context = $content.substring([math]::max(0, $i-10), [math]::min(20, $content.length - [math]::max(0, $i-10))); $nonasciichars += @{char=$char; code=$code; position=$i; context=$context} } }; write-output "found $($nonasciichars.count) non-ascii characters:"; $nonasciichars | foreach-object { write-output " char: '$($_.char)' code: $($_.code) pos: $($_.position) context: '$($_.context)'" }

redacted: $mdFiles = @("SECURITY.md", "ORGANIZATION-SUMMARY.md", "CONTRIBUTING.md", "CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md", "CHANGELOG.md", "docs\USAGE-EXAMPLES.md", "docs\TROUBLESHOOTING.md", "docs\SESSION-LEARNINGS.md", "docs\PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS.md", "docs\PERF-PS-METRICS.md", "docs\observability-roadmap.md", "docs\MCP-COMPLIANCE-SUMMARY.md", "docs\LEARNING.md", "docs\KNOWLEDGE-INDEX.md", "docs\HARDENING-DESIGN.md", "docs\FLAGS.md", "docs\CRITICAL-TIMEOUT-COMMANDS.md", "docs\ARCHITECTURE.md"); $results = @(); foreach ($file in $mdFiles) { $fullPath = "OBF_PATH"; if (Test-Path $fullPath) { $content = Get-Content -Raw $fullPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($content) { $nonAsciiCount = 0; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.Length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $nonAsciiCount++ } }; if ($nonAsciiCount -gt 0) { $results += "$file : $nonAsciiCount non-ASCII characters" } } } }; if ($results.Count -eq 0) { Write-Output "No markdown files have invalid characters!" } else { Write-Output "Files with invalid characters:"; $results | ForEach-Object { Write-Output "  $_" } }
normalized: $mdfiles = @("security.md", "organization-summary.md", "contributing.md", "code_of_conduct.md", "changelog.md", "docs\usage-examples.md", "docs\troubleshooting.md", "docs\session-learnings.md", "docs\product-requirements.md", "docs\perf-ps-metrics.md", "docs\observability-roadmap.md", "docs\mcp-compliance-summary.md", "docs\learning.md", "docs\knowledge-index.md", "docs\hardening-design.md", "docs\flags.md", "docs\critical-timeout-commands.md", "docs\architecture.md"); $results = @(); foreach ($file in $mdfiles) { $fullpath = "obf_path"; if (test-path $fullpath) { $content = get-content -raw $fullpath -erroraction silentlycontinue; if ($content) { $nonasciicount = 0; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $nonasciicount++ } }; if ($nonasciicount -gt 0) { $results += "$file : $nonasciicount non-ascii characters" } } } }; if ($results.count -eq 0) { write-output "no markdown files have invalid characters!" } else { write-output "files with invalid characters:"; $results | foreach-object { write-output " $_" } }

redacted: $filesToCheck = @("ORGANIZATION-SUMMARY.md", "docs\SESSION-LEARNINGS.md", "CONTRIBUTING.md", "docs\KNOWLEDGE-INDEX.md"); foreach ($file in $filesToCheck) { $fullPath = "OBF_PATH"; $content = Get-Content -Raw $fullPath; Write-Output "`n=== $file ==="; $charCounts = @{}; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.Length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $char = $content[$i]; $code = [int]$char; if ($charCounts.ContainsKey($code)) { $charCounts[$code]++ } else { $charCounts[$code] = 1 } } }; $charCounts.GetEnumerator() | Sort-Object Value -Descending | ForEach-Object { Write-Output "  Char: '$([char]$_.Key)' Code: $($_.Key) Count: $($_.Value)" } }
normalized: $filestocheck = @("organization-summary.md", "docs\session-learnings.md", "contributing.md", "docs\knowledge-index.md"); foreach ($file in $filestocheck) { $fullpath = "obf_path"; $content = get-content -raw $fullpath; write-output "`n=== $file ==="; $charcounts = @{}; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $char = $content[$i]; $code = [int]$char; if ($charcounts.containskey($code)) { $charcounts[$code]++ } else { $charcounts[$code] = 1 } } }; $charcounts.getenumerator() | sort-object value -descending | foreach-object { write-output " char: '$([char]$_.key)' code: $($_.key) count: $($_.value)" } }

redacted: $filesToVerify = @("ORGANIZATION-SUMMARY.md", "CONTRIBUTING.md", "CHANGELOG.md", "docs\USAGE-EXAMPLES.md", "docs\TROUBLESHOOTING.md", "docs\SESSION-LEARNINGS.md", "docs\PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS.md", "docs\MCP-COMPLIANCE-SUMMARY.md", "docs\LEARNING.md", "docs\KNOWLEDGE-INDEX.md", "docs\HARDENING-DESIGN.md", "docs\FLAGS.md", "docs\ARCHITECTURE.md"); $cleanFiles = 0; $totalFiles = 0; foreach ($file in $filesToVerify) { $fullPath = "OBF_PATH"; if (Test-Path $fullPath) { $totalFiles++; $content = Get-Content -Raw $fullPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($content) { $nonAsciiCount = 0; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.Length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $nonAsciiCount++ } }; if ($nonAsciiCount -eq 0) { $cleanFiles++; Write-Output "‚úì $file - CLEAN" } else { Write-Output "‚ö† $file - Still has $nonAsciiCount invalid chars" } } } }; Write-Output "`nSummary: $cleanFiles/$totalFiles files are now clean of invalid characters!"
normalized: $filestoverify = @("organization-summary.md", "contributing.md", "changelog.md", "docs\usage-examples.md", "docs\troubleshooting.md", "docs\session-learnings.md", "docs\product-requirements.md", "docs\mcp-compliance-summary.md", "docs\learning.md", "docs\knowledge-index.md", "docs\hardening-design.md", "docs\flags.md", "docs\architecture.md"); $cleanfiles = 0; $totalfiles = 0; foreach ($file in $filestoverify) { $fullpath = "obf_path"; if (test-path $fullpath) { $totalfiles++; $content = get-content -raw $fullpath -erroraction silentlycontinue; if ($content) { $nonasciicount = 0; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $nonasciicount++ } }; if ($nonasciicount -eq 0) { $cleanfiles++; write-output "‚úì $file - clean" } else { write-output "‚ö† $file - still has $nonasciicount invalid chars" } } } }; write-output "`nsummary: $cleanfiles/$totalfiles files are now clean of invalid characters!"

redacted: $allMdFiles = @("SECURITY.md", "README.md", "ORGANIZATION-SUMMARY.md", "CONTRIBUTING.md", "CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md", "CHANGELOG.md", "docs\USAGE-EXAMPLES.md", "docs\TROUBLESHOOTING.md", "docs\SESSION-LEARNINGS.md", "docs\PRODUCT-REQUIREMENTS.md", "docs\MCP-COMPLIANCE-SUMMARY.md", "docs\LEARNING.md", "docs\KNOWLEDGE-INDEX.md", "docs\HARDENING-DESIGN.md", "docs\FLAGS.md", "docs\ARCHITECTURE.md"); $cleanCount = 0; $totalCount = 0; foreach ($file in $allMdFiles) { $fullPath = "OBF_PATH"; if (Test-Path $fullPath) { $totalCount++; $content = Get-Content -Raw $fullPath -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if ($content) { $nonAsciiCount = 0; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.Length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $nonAsciiCount++ } }; if ($nonAsciiCount -eq 0) { $cleanCount++ } else { Write-Output "‚ö† $file still has $nonAsciiCount invalid characters" } } } }; Write-Output "`nüéâ FINAL RESULT: $cleanCount out of $totalCount markdown files are now completely clean!"
normalized: $allmdfiles = @("security.md", "readme.md", "organization-summary.md", "contributing.md", "code_of_conduct.md", "changelog.md", "docs\usage-examples.md", "docs\troubleshooting.md", "docs\session-learnings.md", "docs\product-requirements.md", "docs\mcp-compliance-summary.md", "docs\learning.md", "docs\knowledge-index.md", "docs\hardening-design.md", "docs\flags.md", "docs\architecture.md"); $cleancount = 0; $totalcount = 0; foreach ($file in $allmdfiles) { $fullpath = "obf_path"; if (test-path $fullpath) { $totalcount++; $content = get-content -raw $fullpath -erroraction silentlycontinue; if ($content) { $nonasciicount = 0; for ($i = 0; $i -lt $content.length; $i++) { if ([int]$content[$i] -gt 127) { $nonasciicount++ } }; if ($nonasciicount -eq 0) { $cleancount++ } else { write-output "‚ö† $file still has $nonasciicount invalid characters" } } } }; write-output "`nüéâ final result: $cleancount out of $totalcount markdown files are now completely clean!"
